name: Heather Lindsey's new book, "A Perfect Recipe"
description:
An invitation for the woman desires to get closer to Christ, eat healthier and feel better. 
 
Have you ever wanted an all-in-one book that encourages you to spend time with God, challenges your daily walk to grow as a Christian, and provides great recipes and awesome health tips? Well, you've picked up the right book! 
 
Heather is an average, everyday woman that had a desire to eat healthy, but didn't know where to start! After becoming a vegetarian she found out how hard it was to make meals that actually tasted good and satisfied her desire to still want to eat meat. For the past few years, she has perfected her favorite recipes and put them together in one place! With Heather's time saving techniques and clear instructions, you don't have to toil in the kitchen in order to enjoy a nutritious, delicious meal or snack! In A Perfect Recipe you will: 
 
* Learn how to spend time with God again 
 
* Tackle daily challenges that encourage you to grow in Christ 
 
* Choose from over 50 easy vegetarian recipes 
 
* Convert traditional recipes into healthy, all natural meals 
 
* Receive daily health tips and information 
 
Now, it's time to start the 30 day journey! 
 
www.heatherllindsey.com

name: Cornelius Lindsey's book: "I'm Married. Now What?"
description: Cornelius Lindsey is married to Heather Lindsey, author of Pink Lips & Empty Hearts. Cornelius and Heather chose to save their very first kiss for their wedding day. They realized quickly that after their wedding day, there was still much that they had to learn about marriage Godâ€™s way. There are many examples of marriage, all around us, but many of those examples are not representative of the covenant union between Christ and the Church. This book is purposed to provide married couples with the biblical understanding of how to operate in their marriage, to provide a single person with insight on what marriage will be like for them, and to provide those that are divorced with insight on what they can do differently in their next marriage. In this book, you will be encouraged to: - Understand the connection between our Christian faith and family - Compare the â€œidealâ€ marriage to what actually happens in marriage - Learn about the relationship between you, your spouse, and God - Realize how to break free from feeling like a prisoner in your marriage - Learn what it means to be a submitted wife or a peace-making husband Also, read the tough, personal stories Cornelius shares about his marriage. Inside, he shares some intimate moments he and his wife experienced when a very tragic situation occurred that rocked their marriage to the core. You will be encouraged by what you read, and realize that you are not alone.

name: Cornelius Lindsey's book: So, You Want To Be Married?
description:
An Alternative to Dating and Perfecting the Journey to Marriage
Authored by Cornelius Lindsey 

Do you want to be married? Do you want a marriage that looks like God says it should? Is your marriage lacking the passion it once had? Well, this book is for YOU!

Cornelius Lindsey is married to Heather Lindsey, founder of Pinky Promise. Cornelius and Heather chose to save their very first kiss until their wedding day! Their decision to honor God in their relationship has proven to be core of their marital success. Inspired by Cornelius' many years of dating mistakes, "So, You Want to be Married?" gives you practical tools to make dating and marriage God's way easy! In this book, you will be encouraged to:



Discover the beauty of being single

Get wisdom on where to start in your journey towards marriage

Find out the dangers of worldly dating

Get answers on how to search for "the one" or the "next one"

Read some of Cornelius' personal courtship story

name: "Forgiven" Lipstick
description:
Pink Lips & Empty Heart's "Lipstick!"

Heather Lindsey has teamed with OPUA to come out with a beautiful lipstick line that pairs with her new book: Pink Lips & Empty Hearts

Rock this fun lipsticks with purpose as you remind yourself that you're FORGIVEN & so loved by God! He's always with you and is faithful and just to forgive and cleanse you from your past!

These moisturizing lip colors are paraben free, talc free, lanolin free and gluten free. 
Main ingredients: Euphorbia cerifera (Candelila) Wax, Beeswax, Copernicia cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Ricinus communis (Caster) Seed Oil, Octyldodecyl Ricinoleate, Jojoba Esters, Sesamum indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Diisostearyl Malate, Propylene Glycol Myristyl Ether Acetate, Polyglyceryl-3 Beeswax, Propyl Gallate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocophyeryl Acetate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Fragrance. 

May Contain: Titanium Dioxide CL 77891, Red 27 Lake CI 45410, Red 7 Lake CI 15850, Iron Oxides CI 77491, CI 77499, CI 77499, Yellow 5 Lake CI 19140, Blue I Lake CI 42090, Red 6 Lake CI 15850, Mica CI 77019, Carmine CI 75470, Ferric Ferrocyanide, Tin Orange 5 Lake CI 45370, Bismuth Oxychloride CI 77163.

name: White 3D Gold Cross 5 iPhone Case
description: We are excited to introduce our new white 3-D gold Cross iphone case! This case is a reminder to NOT call randoms, to speak life as you chat with your friends, refuse to go onto unhealthy websites & to be determined to glorify God in every area of your life-- especially in your communication!

name: Heather Lindsey's New Book "Pink Lips & Empty Hearts"
description:
An invitation for every woman who's ever felt like she isn't good enough, pretty enough, saved enough, content enough or doing enough. 

Like millions of women, Heather Lindsey wanted to have it all together. But as life continued to go on, she found herself searching to fill her insecurities with temporary voids and ended up broken, rejected, exhausted and frustrated. Desperate to let God change her from the inside out-she shares her story, struggles and triumphs as she went from having Pink Lips & an Empty Heart to having Pink Lips and a Heart that is completely surrendered to God.

In a society where women are encouraged to portray a certain self-image, Heather challenges women in saying that it is not enough to just get dressed up and portray a "perfect appearance" when deep down, you're empty. As a result, we try hide who we really are from everyone, including God. 

Join Heather Lindsey as she offers witty, fresh advice that you would expect from your best friend over dinner. Compassionate and practical, Pink Lips & An Empty Heart is a step-by-step guide that teaches women how to:

* Be content whether they are single or married
* How to develop a deep, intimate relationship with Christ
* Resist the desire to compare your life to others
* Prioritize their day to day life busy schedule
* Develop in the gifts that God placed inside of you
* BONUS: Practical tips on hair, beauty and other money saving resources

You can purchase it here: www.PinkLipsAndEmptyHearts.com! or via this site. 

**PLEASE NOTE**
The USPS increased shipping rates on 1/28/2013 and due to the increased rate-- it costs more to ship the book, especially internationally.

name: Official Sterling Silver Pinky Promise Ring
description:
It's FINALLY here!!! The Official Pinky Promise Purity & Promise Ring! It's a beautiful mesh ring with a silver heart. The HEART is the same HEART that is in the Pinky Promise logo. It's a reminder that whether single or married-- God has our HEART. We remain married to Him no matter what is going on in our life. It's a reminder to guard your HEART because out of it flows the issues of life. It took me about 9-10 months to come up with a ring that we could wear that would represent our honor to God. So, wear this ring with great honor. 

Some may ask-- which ring finger should I wear it on? When I was single, I wore my promise ring on my left ring hand finger to run off randoms. I knew at the right time-- the right guy would measure up and he would KNOW I was single. But wear it wherever you would like! 

Item is true to size.

This item will arrive within 2-3 weeks of ordering.

name: "Life" Black on Black Cross Bracelet
description: This bracelet is a reminder that LIFE happens. You'll have good days, bad days, amazing days, sad days-- but no matter what happens--you recognize that on this earth you will have tribulation and to be of good cheer because Jesus overcame this WORLD. So when you look down, smile. God has your back. He's always with you. He will never leave or forsake you.

name: "Future" Black Cross Bracelet
description:
When you think of black-- you may think of it as being dark. The reason I chose a black cross bracelet is to remind you that no matter what happened in your PAST ALL things are made NEW. GOD will use your many mess-ups & struggles and USE your past to help somebody else. So as you rock this-- remind yourself that you're free from your past, guilt  & condemnation. God loves you so much. 

Black with a silver diamond cross. 

This item is adjustable to your wrist size.

name: "Shine" Cross Bracelet
description:
When I first laid eyes on this bracelet, I thought- wow! That thing is a bright light. It reminds me that we are supposed to be BRIGHT lights & SHINE in this dark world & represent Christ in everything that we do. 

So, I'm introducing a lot of bling as a reminder.. that you are to be the light. Stand out. Live for Christ & don't submit to this crazy world. God wants ALL of you.

The item is silver and adjustable.

Orders can take up to 2-3 weeks at max.

name: "Hope" Multi-colored Cross Bracelet
description:
This bracelet is being used in an efforts to raise money for our missons trip. When I think about "Hope"-- it makes me think of the HOPE we will give the city of Addis Ababa, Ethiopia when we pray with them, feed them, and provide food and water. 

OUR hope should always come from Christ alone. Even if you're in a place in your life where you're feeling hope-less, know that you can find HOPE and joy in Christ. So as your rock this bracelet.. know that YOU just helped to feed so many.  

Please allow 2-3 weeks for arrival.

name: Cross Ring
description:
Enjoy this gold-plated ring that reminds you of your  honor to promise God with your life! 

One size fits most.

name: "Purity" White Cross Bracelet
description:
Pinky Promise is now introducing the "Purity White" Cross Bracelet. This bracelet is for those of you that are single AND married. As a wife, it's saying that I am going to stay committed to Christ and my marriage and stay pure before Christ by not getting into unhealthy relationships physically, emotionally or mentally. Same goes for those of you that are single. You're saying that THIS represents your purity and marriage to Christ alone and until someone pays the price for you through marriage-- they cannot afford YOU. 

Please allow 2-3 weeks for arrival or sooner. 

You will receive this exact silver cross with the white adjustable band.

name: "Purpose" Bracelet
description:
When I first saw this bracelet-- I thought FIRE & PASSION & PURPOSE! Meaning-- YOU have a plan for your life. This bright red side cross bracelet i s a beautiful reminder that no matter what is going on around you; God has a PLAN for your life. He loves you  like crazy. 

Please allow at least 2 weeks for arrival. This item is in stock.

name: Custom Bracelet!
description:
This bracelet is for those of you who want a "surprise" bracelet for your birthday, or you saw something I posted (custom order). All orders are $20. BE sure to note what you want on your order. (ie. Crazy Faithful, Jesus Freak, Virgin, Trust God, Stay Faithful, etc) If you want me to surprise you-- note that! 

**the attached picture is a custom order**

name: "Love" Turquoise Side Cross Bracelet
description:
Enjoy the "Love" Turquoise side-cross gold cross bracelet! This bracelet is a reminder that God's love and faithfulness is never-ending. Refuse to compare your life to others or worry about when things will or will not happen. God's LOVE will carry you through each season and grace you. God's timing is perfect. Trust Him.


This item is the exact item you will receive. Please note that only the turquoise bracelet will be included in your order.

name: "Peace" Bracelet
description:
"Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid." - John 14:27

Rock this signature "Peace" bracelet to go along with the rest of the collection! Its' a beautiful reminder that you melt in HIS peace daily. #Jesus

Please allow 2-3 weeks for arrival or sooner. Note that all charms are different.

name: "Joy" Silver Side Cross Bracelet
description:
You asked for Silver and you got it! When I first saw this bracelet-- it made me think of joy! Yes, LIFE will happen, but when we KNOW that God has our back, we can be calm and rest in the fact that Jesus has overcome this world, so we donâ€™t have to. Rock this bracelet as a reminder that your joy comes from HIM alone, not a person, a job, your bank account or anything else.

This item is on backorder. Please allow at least 3 weeks for arrival.

This item is adjustable.

name: Pinky Promise Journal
description:
So, I started a journal challenge (http://heatherllindsey.blogspot.com/2012/04/join-journal-challenge.html) and you're invited to join! it's simple! You purchase a journal, make sure you have a bible you can read & notecards! You mark each consistent day you spend with God. So today, will be day 1, tomorrow day 2.. and you keep going.. and going! It will help you to stay accountable! 

So check out this personalized 6 x 8 journal. 70 pages with a pen.

name: "Linda Rose Gold Cross" Bracelet
description:
Pinky Promise is now introducing the Rose Gold "Linda Cross Bracelet"-- "Linda" means beautiful and named after my beautiful mother who is FILLED with love and adopted me and 23 of my sisters and brothers. When she was a child, she would go to the orphanage daily and play with the children and promise them that when she got older, she would come back and adopt them. Most of my brothers and sisters have down syndrome, CP, and are mentally and physically disabled. My mother always adopted the child that nobody else wanted. The cross reminds us of what Christ did for us daily. Our value comes from CHRIST alone and no other. Itâ€™s what He did for us on the CROSS that makes us whole. So together, it seemed right to ask youâ€”WHO is beautiful to you in your life? Letâ€™s honor love and cherish them.

This bracelet is a fun reminder to rock as you go throughout your day, representing that YOU belong to Christ and to love others unconditionally! 

All bracelets are the same and adjust to each wrist.

Shipping time is 7-10 days.

name: "Best Friends Forever" Bracelet
description:
In discussing relationships, I started making "BFF" bracelets for my best friends, so I figured now would be a good time to introduce them to you. "No Randoms" covers not having random relationships & friendships. BFF just says, that my friends are real, COVENANT relationships and I GIVE my friend the advantage, I don't take it. I pray for my friends, love them, support them & encourage them. I Pinky Promise.

So rock this bracelet hard and give one to a close friend!

Orders take 10-14 business days to ship.

name: "Grace" Bracelet
description:
God's grace is perfect. Remember that as you go throughout your day. Sometimes, we can get overwhelmed with life & after we seek the wisdom from God and HE shows us that we are doing what He wants us to do.. then HE will grace us in our everyday life. When the grace leaves your life, question that-- not Christ. His ways & doings are perfect & He never changes. So, with all that being said.. rock with "Grace" bracelet as a perfect reminder of HIS grace. 

Please note that no two bracelets are the same! So, you may receive a charm different then the one in this photo. Other than that--everything else remains the same in each photo. Charms are subject to availability. 

Due to the high demand, please allow 10-14 business days for arrival.

name: Men's Promise Bracelet
description:
After popular demand, we are introducing the "Promise" bracelet for our men & young boys! It's a perfect reminder that your guy is saving himself for marriage and IF he is married- He's promising to love you like Christ loves the Church. He's promising to always support, encourage & protect his wife. He's promising to let God develop into the leader that God called him to be and to continually die to his flesh & take up his cross to follow Christ. 

It's a simple, yet classic bracelet that pairs well with any outfit & fits well for your son, boyfriend, husband or brother!


Each bracelet is hand crafted with love there is a maximum lead time of 2-3 weeks. Please note that orders MAY be shipped way before that time, based on the demand.

description:

Your cousin, sister, niece or daughter will be starting off EARLY with her promise to honor God with her body that will only carry into her adult life.

Each bracelet is hand crafted with love there is a maximum lead time of 2-3 weeks. Please note that orders MAY be shipped way before that time, based on the demand.

description:
What has God freed you from? This bracelet is a beautiful reminder that God HAS and continues to "free" you in every area. Don't try to figure out your life, instead, trust Him. The plans that HE has for you are amazing. (Jeremiah 29:11). So enjoy this beautiful bracelet with a vintage charm and a button that adjust to your wrist length.

name: "Jesus" Bracelet
description:
You'll love this simple but classic, "Jesus" bracelet! It pairs well with any of the other bracelets! Jesus is always with you, He'll never leave you or forsake you. Your hope must ALWAYS be in Him and nothing else.

Please note that no two bracelets are the same! So, you may receive a charm different then the one in this photo. Other than that--everything else remains the same in each photo. Charms are subject to availability. 


Each bracelet is hand crafted with love there is a maximum lead time of 2-3 weeks. Please note that orders MAY be shipped way before that time, based on the demand.

name: "Pinky Promise" Bracelet
description:
You're purchasing a beautiful handcrafted "Pinky Promise" Bracelet. With silver alpha beads, a vintage charm and a button that will adjust to any wrist size--this piece makes a beautiful gift and accessorizes any outfit! 

Please note that no two bracelets are the same! So, you may receive a charm different then the one in this photo. Other than that--everything else remains the same in each photo. Charms are subject to availability. 

Each bracelet is hand crafted with love there is a maximum lead time of 2-3 weeks. Please note that orders MAY be shipped way before that time, based on the demand. 


What does "Pinky Promise" mean?

For the single person: It's a promise to honor God with your body. To refuse to give your body to anyone that hasn't paid the price for you called marriage. It's a promise to stay pure before God in EVERY single way. It's a promise that says, I won't test the boundaries in my relationship to see how far I can push it sexually--but instead--I want God to have my heart.

For the married person: It's a promise to God that you will honor your marriage covenant. It's saying that I promise not to step outside of my marriage, cheat on my spouse and that I'll work through every issue.

name: "Forgiven" Bracelet
description:
Do you know how much God loves you and that IF you confess your sins He is faithful & just to forgive you from ALL of your sins & cleanse you from ALL unrighteoutness?? (1 John 1:9)

Enjoy this beautiful reminder that YOU are forgiven. 

He loves you like crazy.

Each charm on the bracelets are different. Please allow up to 2-3 weeks for arrival.

name: Pinky Promise Baby-Doll Adult Tee
description:
How fitting to rock this beautiful "Pinky Promise" signature tee and what an awesome opportunity to use this shirt to share Christ when others ask... "What does Pinky Promise mean?"

Pinky promise simply means:

A promise to honor God with your body whether single or married. A beautiful reminder that the only One that paid the price for you was Christ alone and until you get married--your body belongs to CHRIST. For those that are married--a beautiful promise to mirror your marriage after Christ & His Church. So wives, submit to your husbands and husbands, love your wife ike Christ loves the Church.

name: "No Randoms" Baby Doll Tee
description:
This lightweight "No Randoms" Baby Doll Tee is perfect for the summer and to go with your "Pinky Promise" collection!

For the single person: It's a person that you know you'll never marry but you date them because you're lonely or to fill a void. It's that ex that you KNOW isn't any good for you but you keep going back to them because you're comfortable. It's also for those unhealthy friendships that are distracting you and pulling you away from Christ. What a beautiful reminder that we COMMIT our whole lives to Christ daily. 


 For the married person: It's saying that you won't allow unhealthy relationships to affect your marriage. This could be a co-worker or an ex boyfriend or girlfriend that is trying to connect with you emotionally or physically. It could be that friend that talks about your spouse in a negative way or gossips about everyone and anything. "No Randoms" is a reminder of Proverbs 4:23 "Guard your heart, because out of your heart flows the issues of life"
